DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase I , open-label , single-sequence drug interaction study evaluate effect repeat dos GSK2248761 pharmacokinetics simvastatin , atorvastatin , rosuvastatin healthy adult subject . In study , approximately 14 subject receive single dos simvastatin , atorvastatin , rosuvastatin two occasion , alone follow administration repeat dos GSK2248761 . Safety evaluations serial PK sample collect treatment period . A follow-up visit occur 7-14 day last dose study drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study Between Simvastatin , Atorvastatin , Rosuvastatin , GSK2248761 Healthy Subjects .
DOC.detailed_description: ViiV Healthcare new sponsor study , GlaxoSmithKline process update system reflect change sponsorship .

The subject participate clinical trial receive investigational product within following time period prior first dose day current study : 30 day , 5 halflives twice duration biological effect investigational product ( whichever longer ) . Use prescription nonprescription drug , include vitamin , herbal dietary supplement ( include St John 's Wort ) within 7 day ( 14 day drug potential enzyme inducer ) 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication , unless opinion Investigator GSK Medical Monitor medication interfere study procedure compromise subject safety .
